Is hereditary leiomyomatosis and renal cell cancer inherited ?,"This condition is inherited in an autosomal dominant pattern, which means one copy of the altered gene in each cell is sufficient to cause the disorder.",GHR,hereditary leiomyomatosis and renal cell can
